        public java.lang.String getType(java.lang.String fieldName)
        Description copied from interface: BasicOperation
        Returns the data type of the specified attribute name. Returns null if that attribute does not exist.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the attribute

      • addValue

        public void addValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from interface: BasicOperation
        Creates a new attribute name with the specified value and a default type(string) if that attribute doesn't already exist. If the attribute already exists the value is appended to the existing value(s); for an LDAP source, the value is added as a new "multi-value".
        Specified by:
        addValue in interface BasicOperation
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the attribute
        value - the value for the attribute

      • setValue

        public void setValue(java.lang.String fieldName,
                     java.lang.String value)
        Description copied from interface: BasicOperation
        Sets the value of an attribute. If the specified attribute does not exist, it is created with default type(string) and the value is then added.
        Specified by:
        setValue in interface BasicOperation
        Parameters:
        fieldName - the name of the attribute
        value - the value for the attribute
